name: Blocky's Adventure On The Island
description:
Welcome to the island!!

This is a Sandbox where you play as a cube on a island.

CONTROLS

Single Player

WASD to move

Z, X and C to build

TAB to switch character

With the other character press E to shoot the gun

Multi Player

if you are in the car press space to leave

- To go in Multiplayer

Press -

Multiplayer

Arrow Keys to move

N M , . to place
